Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2009 03:04PM Chutney wrote: hi cheri5, I couldn't wear a bra either - but don't care that I look lopsided to the rest of the universe.  I didn't like my boob flopping around either though.  My surgeon suggested 'adhesive bra' - sold in lingerie section of clothing store.  it's a shaped paper tape (something like a bandaid) that women wear under strapless dresses but don't want their boobs to droop.  it's working for me and I don't have to deal with the burn, peeling, swollen arm/chest at all.
Posts.Title: no bra during radiation Cherie5 Leah_S
